name: cardsmith-studio
description: CardSmith Studio: Windows-first desktop app for designing and exporting tabletop/card-game components.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n UI,MAIN -c auto "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:main"
scripts.dev:main: wait-on tcp:5173 && npm --prefix apps/main run dev
scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/core run build && npm --prefix packages/storage run build && npm --prefix apps/renderer run build && npm --prefix apps/main run build
scripts.doctor: npm run doctor:renderer && npm run doctor:main && npm run doctor:audit
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm --prefix apps/main run dist
